image.title: Poetry Voice hosts Kierstin Bridger and Uche Ogbuji

channel.itunes:keywords: Poetry, Spoken Word, Hip-Hop, Colorado, US West, Kierstin Bridger, Uche Ogbuji
channel.title: Poetry Voice, with Kierstin Bridger and Uche Ogbuji
channel.itunes:author: Kierstin Bridger and Uche Ogbuji
channel.description: Poetry Voice podcast takes the art of lovely words into the plentiful Colorado sunshine, keeping it lit. Much banter, decanters of laughter, featuring bards, and poetics they've mastered, with fresh interviews; all the news that stays news. From Colorado's Western slope and beyond.
channel.itunes:summary: Poetry Voice podcast takes the art of lovely words into the plentiful Colorado sunshine, keeping it lit. Much banter, decanters of laughter, featuring bards, and poetics they've mastered, with fresh interviews; all the news that stays news. From Colorado's Western slope and beyond.
channel.itunes:subtitle: From the Western Slope to the world

item.title: Episode 8: Just Deserts
item.description: Kierstin interviews Joni Wallace In Tucson, Arizona in a set that brings poetry and sound together with much discussion of the genesis and threat of The Bomb. Uche and Kierstin bookend the interviews with the usual hijinks.
item.itunes:summary: Kierstin interviews Joni Wallace In Tucson, Arizona in a set that brings poetry and sound together with much discussion of the genesis and threat of The Bomb. Uche and Kierstin bookend the interviews with the usual hijinks.
item.itunes:subtitle: "So it's going to be loud."

item.title: Episode 7: Fourteener
item.description: Uche interviews poet, professor and mountain man David J. Rothman at Louisville Public Library, later joining Kierstin in downtown Denver for discussion of many mountainous things.
item.itunes:summary: Uche interviews poet, professor and mountain man David J. Rothman at Louisville Public Library, later joining Kierstin in downtown Denver for discussion of many mountainous things.
item.itunes:subtitle: "I wonder whom Donald Trump's mother slept with."

item.title: Episode 6: Sirens and All That Can Seduce
item.description: Kierstin and Uche are joined by Denver poets Nicky Beer and Brian Barker in downtown Denver for wide-ranging conversation, peppered with the usual fun bits.
item.itunes:summary: Kierstin and Uche are joined by Denver poets Nicky Beer and Brian Barker in downtown Denver for wide-ranging conversation, peppered with the usual fun bits.
item.itunes:subtitle: "Looking forward to this, this is our first foursome."

item.title: Episode 5: Abundance
item.description: Kierstin and Uche are together again at Ridgway Global tuning into Kierstin's interview with poet and radio personality Lauren Camp. Also: MORE OUD!
item.itunes:summary: Kierstin and Uche are together again at Ridgway Global tuning into Kierstin's interview with poet and radio personality Lauren Camp. Also: MORE OUD!
item.itunes:subtitle: "Under the loose-tooth shards of the Cimmaron range."

item.title: Episode 4: Winter Dark/Winter Light
item.description: Kierstin and Uche get together at the Lithic Press Bookstore & Gallery with owner and Colorado Poet Danny Rosen.
item.itunes:summary: Kierstin and Uche get together at the Lithic Press Bookstore & Gallery with owner and Colorado Poet Danny Rosen.
item.itunes:subtitle: "At the Lithic, feeling mythic."

item.title: Episode 3: Coming Home
item.description: Kierstin interviews and teases song out of poet Kyle Harvey, woven in with her joining Uche to discuss Sharon Olds, Derek Walcott and more.
item.itunes:summary: Kierstin interviews and teases song out of poet Kyle Harvey, woven in with her joining Uche to discuss Sharon Olds, Derek Walcott and more.
item.itunes:subtitle: "Chilling in the glow of the year's first snow, right outside my window."

item.title: Episode 2: Day of the Dead
item.description: Jennifer Hancock joins Kierstin and Uche in discussion ranging from hurricanes to the awful uses of belts.
item.itunes:summary: Jennifer Hancock joins Kierstin and Uche in discussion ranging from hurricanes to the awful uses of belts.
item.itunes:subtitle: "We'll show the world the Day of the Dead edible skull on my head."

item.title: Episode 1: Beginnings
item.description: Kierstin and Uche launch Poetry Voice in the heart of Denver RiNo.
item.itunes:summary: Kierstin and Uche launch Poetry Voice in the heart of Denver RiNo.
item.itunes:subtitle: "Speaking of energy pouring inâ€¦"
